result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rashad R Lewis

records.addlTxt: for deft from Stanley Correctional for Plea/Sentencing hearing on 11-14-22 at 9:15AM (Emailed RCSO on 10-20-22 at 9:26AM)

Defendant mailed letter Request for Prompt Disposition. Defendant requesting to have any upcoming hearings be heard via zoom. Defendant also requesting to have a speedy trail. Defendant is in custody at Stanley Correctional Institution.

9:06 AM Defendant Rashad R Lewis not in court.  Attorney Joe Edward Kremkoski in court for Rashad R Lewis.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew W Kline in court for the State of Wisconsin. Digital Court Reporter: Hannah Wronkowski. 
Deft is in custody but parties are not sure where the deft is.
Court finds the deft is at Dodge
BTC: Matter adjourned, State to prepare OTT.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 14, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Status conference on September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
DA AUTHORIZATION TO OBTAIN COPIES OF CERTAIN EVIDENCE

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. No contact with co defendant Prakash Patel

2:07 PM Prosecuting attorney Lucas P. Bennewitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Rashad R Lewis appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gregory A Holdahl appeared by video for Rashad R Lewis. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.
Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on August 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Initial appearance on June 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Pursuant to Wisconsin's Supreme Court Order issued March 22, 2020 this hearing being held via video and telephone conferencing. You may view this hearing by using the following link:  https://www.wicourts.gov/courts/livestream.htm, Racine County, Judicial Court Commissioner
